name: R4B-AppointmentResponse-R5-AppointmentResponse
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B AppointmentResponse into FHIR R5

element.display: A reply to an appointment request for a patient and/or practitioner(s), such as a confirmation or rejection

target.display: A reply to an appointment request for a patient and/or practitioner(s), such as a confirmation or rejection
target.comment: R4B `AppointmentResponse` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AppointmentResponse`

R4B `AppointmentResponse.actor` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `AppointmentResponse.actor` - actor has change due to type change: R4B `actor` `Reference` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `actor`
R4B `AppointmentResponse.appointment` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AppointmentResponse.appointment`

R4B `AppointmentResponse.comment` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R5 `AppointmentResponse.comment` - comment has change due to type change: R4B comment string has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 comment
R4B `AppointmentResponse.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AppointmentResponse.contained`

element.display: Time from appointment, or requested new end time

target.display: Time from appointment, or requested new end time
target.comment: R4B `AppointmentResponse.end` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AppointmentResponse.end`
R4B `AppointmentResponse.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `AppointmentResponse.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `AppointmentResponse.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AppointmentResponse.id`
R4B `AppointmentResponse.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AppointmentResponse.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `AppointmentResponse.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AppointmentResponse.implicitRules`
R4B `AppointmentResponse.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `AppointmentResponse.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0
R4B `AppointmentResponse.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AppointmentResponse.meta`

R4B `AppointmentResponse.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `AppointmentResponse.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

R4B `AppointmentResponse.participantStatus` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AppointmentResponse.participantStatus` - participantStatus has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/participationstatus|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/appointmentresponse-status|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Role of participant in the appointment

target.display: Role of participant in the appointment
target.comment: R4B `AppointmentResponse.participantType` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AppointmentResponse.participantType`

element.display: Time from appointment, or requested new start time

target.display: Time from appointment, or requested new start time
target.comment: R4B `AppointmentResponse.start` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AppointmentResponse.start`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `AppointmentResponse.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `AppointmentResponse.text`
